name: If The Kids Are United
content: I wanna say it now for now is today
Life has been given so why not enjoy
Kids with feelings like you and me
For you are him and he is you
That I've opened up your eyes
Freedom is given speak how you feel
I have no freedom how do you feel
If we all stand together it
If the kids kids kids are united united
They will never never never be divided
If the kids kids kids are united united
They will never never never be divided
They will never never never be divided
They will never never never be divided
